name: market for fuel cell, stack polymer electrolyte membrane, 2kW electrical, future | fuel cell, stack polymer electrolyte membrane, 2kW electrical, future | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/1725/documentation

This is a market activity. Each market represents the consumption mix of a product in a given geography, connecting suppliers with consumers of the same product in the same geographical area. Markets group the producers and also the imports of the product (if relevant) within the same geographical area. They also account for transport to the consumer and for the losses during that process, when relevant.;This is the market for  'fuel cell, stack polymer electrolyte membrane, 2kW electrical, future', in the Global geography.;Transport from producers to consumers of this product in the geography covered by the market is included.;This is an immobile infrastructure, representing the production of a polymer electrolyte membrane (PEM) fuel cell stack with 2 kW electrical output. It has a lifetime of 6 years that corrsponds to 32,000 h. The process includes the most important building materials, their decommission, the energy consumption during production and land use. 

This activity starts with the built infrastructure ready to use.

This activity ends with the infrastructure made accessible to the users. Transport or losses are considered irrelevant for this product.
